Install Web Clipper

Click the button below to download the extension package:

Download Web Clipper Package (.zip file)

Installation Instructions:

  1. Download the .zip file using the button above.
  2. Unzip the downloaded file. You should find a .crx file inside.
  3. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions
  4. Enable "Developer mode" in the top right corner.
  5. Drag and drop the .crx file from the unzipped folder into the Chrome extensions page.

Note: You may encounter security warnings. This installation method is recommended only for personal use or testing.
